business_objective: Reduce invoice exception resolution time while preserving policy controls.
steps: Enable escalation at 80 percent of SLA
Publish workflow and notify queue owners
system_behavior_after_completion: New exceptions route to the configured queue and timers start automatically.
verification_procedure: Submit a test exception and verify queue assignment, SLA countdown, and escalation trigger in Audit.

business_objective: Resolve open compliance exceptions with documented remediation evidence.
steps: Add remediation summary and target date
system_behavior_after_completion: Exception status changes to Review Pending and appears in weekly compliance snapshot.
verification_procedure: Confirm the exception appears in reporting with attachments and attestation timestamp.

business_objective: Deliver consistent weekly compliance visibility to leadership.
system_behavior_after_completion: Snapshot is stored in report history and digest notifications are dispatched.
verification_procedure: Verify report timestamp, metric totals, and delivery logs for the leadership group.

business_objective: Add a new system endpoint with ownership and connectivity checks.
steps: Enter system name and endpoint type
Record owner team and support channel
system_behavior_after_completion: Integration appears in Connected Systems and emits heartbeat checks.
verification_procedure: Confirm successful heartbeat and sample payload receipt in integration logs.

business_objective: Assemble an auditable evidence pack for monthly control review.
steps: Select audit period and control set
Submit pack for audit lead sign-off
system_behavior_after_completion: Evidence pack is versioned and tracked with immutable hash metadata.
verification_procedure: Open manifest and confirm all controls have linked artifacts and checksum values.
